name: Bali Healer and Ubud Tour
description: Have seen the movie Eat, Pray, Love ? then you will remember Elizabeth character starred by Julia Robert going to Balinese healer or local called Balian. Realized or not from the book and the movie "Eat Pray Love" travelers who come to Bali seem to have added a visit to Balinese healer 'a must to do' lists, with other activities i.e yoga class, Bali sightseeing, or spa. In Bali, Balinese healer is the traditional healer who play an important part in Bali's culture by treating physical and mental illness, removing spells and channeling information from ancestors.
